name: UPaperFlipbook
doc: Contains an animation sequence of sprite frames

FramesPerSecond: The nominal frame rate to play this flipbook animation back at
KeyFrames: The set of key frames for this flipbook animation (each one has a duration and a sprite to display)
DefaultMaterial: The material to use on a flipbook player instance if not overridden

methods.name: GetKeyFrameIndexAtTime
methods.doc:
Returns the keyframe index that covers the specified time (in seconds), or INDEX_NONE if none exists.
When bClampToEnds is true, it will choose the first or last keyframe if the time is out of range.

methods.name: GetNumFrames
methods.doc: Returns the total number of frames

methods.name: GetNumKeyFrames
methods.doc: Returns the number of key frames

methods.name: GetSpriteAtFrame
methods.doc: Returns the sprite at the specified keyframe index, or nullptr if none exists

methods.name: GetSpriteAtTime
methods.doc:
Returns the sprite at the specified time (in seconds), or nullptr if none exists.
When bClampToEnds is true, it will choose the first or last sprite if the time is out of range.

methods.name: GetTotalDuration
methods.doc: Returns the total duration in seconds

methods.name: IsValidKeyFrameIndex
methods.doc: Is the specified Index within the valid range of key frames?
